oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pvt. Samuel Wallace Duncan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Samuel Wallace Duncan, Co. M, 7th Penn. Vol. Cav. Regt., USA. Duncan was from Johnstown, Pennsylvania. He enlisted in February 1864, fought through Tennessee and Georgia, and participated in the battles and skirmishes of Kingston,; Ringgold, Rocky Face, Rome, Allatoona, Big Shanty, Kennesaw, and others. He chose to stay in the South after he was discharged in 1865. He died in Chattanooga in 1915. He is buried at Forest Hills Cemetery.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Duncan, Samuel Wallace
